register.name: ERRINJCON
register.desc: PCI Express Error Injection Control Register

field.name: enable_acpi_mode_for_pm
field.desc: Power Management events handled via _PMEGPE messages

field.name: enable_system_error_only_for_aer
field.desc: PCI Express errors do not trigger MSI or Intx

field.name: max_read_completion_combine_size
field.desc: All completions are returned without combining

field.name: zero_ob_tc
field.desc: Forces TC field to zero for outbound requests

field.name: phold_disable
field.desc: IIO responds Unsupported request on assert_phold

field.name: peer2peer_memory_read_disable
field.desc: Peer-to-peer memory reads are master aborted

field.name: disable_l0s_on_transmitter
field.desc: IIO never puts its tx in L0s state

field.name: SMIATENDPS
field.desc: SMI at End of Pass-Through Enable

field.name: SMIBYENDPS
field.desc: SMI Caused by End of Pass-Through

register.name: MSDEVFUNCHIDE
register.desc: MS Unit Device Function Hide Register

field.name: CPUBUSNO0
field.desc: Bus Number for IIO devices in the processor

field.name: CPUBUSNO1
field.desc: Bus Number for non IIO devices in the processor

field.name: start_tsod_poll
field.desc: Start reading of all enabled devices

field.name: start_tsod_poll
field.desc: Start reading of all enabled devices

field.name: start_tsod_poll
field.desc: Start reading of all enabled devices

field.name: start_tsod_poll
field.desc: Start reading of all enabled devices

field.name: BUS_NUM_0
field.desc: Bus number BIOS assigned for IIO

field.name: BUS_NUM_1
field.desc: Bus number BIOS assigned for Non-IIO

register.name: PLAT_FRMW_PROT_CTRL_MSR
register.undef: Not accessible outside SMM, causes #GP fault when trying to read from ring0
